question: May 29 is celebrated as the _____________.
option4: International Day of United Nations Peacekeepers
answer: International Day of United Nations Peacekeepers
explanation: 29 May is the International Day of United Nations Peacekeepers. The International Day of United Nations Peacekeepers is a day to remember those who served in United Nations (UN) peacekeeping operations. They also honour the memory of people who died in the name of peace.
